hotels.title: Sky-High Nairobi Opulence with Two Restaurants & Pool
hotels.description: Discover the vibrant heart of Kenya with a stay at the centrally located Mövenpick Hotel & Residences Nairobi. Experience the city's rich culture and history from the Nairobi National Museum's archaeological treasures to the bustling Maasai Market - all within a short drive from the hotel. Retreat to this urban oasis for a dip in the heated outdoor pool or a session at the state-of-the-art fitness centre. Savour the diverse flavours of Kenyan and Mediterranean cuisine at Baluba Restaurant and The View Restaurant, or enjoy a selection of drinks at Kijani Bar.

hotels.title: Serene Five-Star Kempinski Hideaway in the Heart of Nairobi
hotels.description: Among the hustle and bustle of Kenya’s cosmopolitan capital is the idyllic, pink-hued Villa Rosa Kempinski Nairobi. Offering guests a powerful mélange of old-world European luxury and vibrant Kenyan hospitality within a five-star setting, this grand hotel is the perfect base for those wishing to explore the lush savannah reserves, perfectly manicured golf courses, modern shopping malls and extraordinary museums that make this city utterly irresistible. With eight restaurants and bars - including a cigar lounge - and a world-class spa, there's no better place to discover Kempinski luxury within this enthralling capital.

hotels.title: Stylish Five-Star Kenya Stay Minutes from Nairobi Airport
hotels.description: Boasting five-star elegance and a convenient location, Crowne Plaza Nairobi Airport, an IHG Hotel, is a tranquil refuge moments from the aviation action. Just a 30-minute jaunt from Nairobi National Park and its abundance of awe-inspiring wildlife, you'll also savour seasonal fare at the four onsite eateries. After a busy day, indulge in a rejuvenating spa reatment or take a dip in the shimmering pool before retiring to your stylish room or suite.

hotels.title: Luxurious Nairobi Fairmont Retreat with Three Restaurants & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Experience the timeless elegance of a luxury stay in the heart of the lively Kenyan capital of Nairobi. Fairmont The Norfolk offers a tranquil oasis amid the city's vibrant energy. Indulge in an array of culinary delights at one of the hotel's onsite restaurants, or enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool alongside a selection of drinks at the bar. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the city's rich history and culture. Visit the nearby National Museum of Kenya, take a leisurely stroll through the lush Nairobi Botanic Garden, or immerse yourself in the vibrant local markets. This hotel is also conveniently located close to the Nairobi National Park, where you can witness the majesty of Africa's wildlife firsthand, including lions, leopards and giraffes.
